name: JointsCollection
description: Creates a Collection of Joints. Replaces defaults with overrides.

inputParameters.name: Defaults
inputParameters.description: List of JointDefinitions that serve as default.

inputParameters.name: Overrides
inputParameters.description: List of JointDefinitions that serve as overrides or extras. If there is a JointDefinition for the same pair of Beams in Defaults, the JointType will be overwritten. If not, a new JointDefinition will be added.
